attributes.action: Use the long term benefit claimants to carry out services for their local area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose the use of the unemployed to be tasked with providing services to their local area. Such a general tidying of highways and byways including pavements and verges, parks etc. Carrying out general maintenance to public buildings. The benefit payments should also be paid in accordance of the works being carried out, no work no pay, thus making protential savings for the goverment.
